verse.gurmukhi: ho suDin svYXw mwJ infr huie dIjIAY ]1285]

en.bdb: Uttering firstly the names of the noose of Yama, add the word “Har” and hen the word “Nrip” four times and in this way, O good poet  know the names of Tupak and use them consciously in Swayyas.1285.
